Terms of Service

Last Updated: May 22, 2025

Welcome to Game-Critic. By accessing and using our website, you agree to be bound by the following Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use this site.

Use of the
website You may use our website only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these terms. You may not use our content for illegal, abusive or infringing activities.

2. Intellectual property
All content on this website (text, images, logos, designs, etc.) is the property of Game-Critic or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify or distribute any content without prior written permission.

3. User Account
If you create an account, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login information and for all activities that occur under your account.

4. Limitation of Liability
Game-Critic is not liable for any direct or indirect damages arising out of the use or inability to use our website.

5. Modifications
We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Updates will be posted on this page with the corresponding date.

Privacy Policy

Last updated: May 22, 2025

At Game-Critic, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy describes what information we collect, how we use it and what rights you have over it.

1. Information we collect
Personal data: such as name, email address, IP address, and other information provided when you register or contact us.

Usage data: information about how you access and use the website.

2. How we use your information
We use your information to:

Provide and improve our services

Communicate with you

Comply with legal obligations

3. Cookies
We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance the user experience. You can manage your cookie preferences from your browser.

4. Sharing information
We do not share your personal information with third parties, except as necessary to provide our services or comply with legal obligations.

5. Security
We implement reasonable security measures to protect your information. However, no Internet transmission is completely secure.

6. Your rights
You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal data. To exercise these rights, contact us at: [psgrupo15@gmail.com].

7. Changes to this policy
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you via our website if we make material changes.

footer.tutorial.step_1: Welcome to Game-Critic! Here you can easily discover and rate video games.

footer.tutorial.step_5: Follow other users and check their ratings from the "Following" section.
